sentences.en: Animal cell has a lot of organelle .

sentences.en: Free - radicals mostly destroy membranaceous structures of cell and organelle.
sentences.cn: 自由基主要破坏细胞及细胞器的膜性结构.

sentences.en: Functional aspects of nuclear: : It is the largest organelle in the cell and the place for genetic storage, replication and transcription.
sentences.cn: 细胞核的功能： 细胞核是真核细胞中最大的细胞器，也是遗传物质储存、复制和转录的场所。

sentences.en: Other injured ganglion cells membranes might be dissolved and showed dropsy and disintegration of organelle.
sentences.cn: 也可见核膜溶解,细胞器水肿、崩解.

sentences.en: The cell organelle were often kept normal in apoptotic cells.
sentences.cn: 凋亡神经元胞浆内的细胞器保持完整.

sentences.en: There are numerous amoeboid nuclei suspended in the organelle - rich cytoplasm.
sentences.cn: 在富含细胞器的细胞质中,有许多变形核.

sentences.en: There is distinct nucleolus the naked nucleus and some dispersed organelle as lysosome around the nucleus.
sentences.cn: 电镜下裸核有明显核仁,核周围有溶酶体等散落的细胞器.

sentences.en: There were basically complete organelle structure in matural oocyte .
sentences.cn: 成熟卵子内已有基本完整的细胞器结构。

sentences.en: This organelle gets stressed or angry.
sentences.cn: 这个细胞器越来越疲劳或愤怒.

sentences.en: This organelle produces ATP, an energy molecule that is used by many other cellular processes.
sentences.cn: 这器官产生三磷酸腺苷, 能源分子所使用的其他许多细胞过程.

sentences.en: This paper revealed the pathological changes of tumor cells in the subcellular(organelle) level, and provided the theoretical basis for the diagnosis and treatment of canine mammary tumor.
sentences.cn: 本试验从亚细胞（细胞器）水平上认识和了解细胞的病变，以期为犬乳腺肿瘤疾病的诊断和治疗提供理论依据。

sentences.en: Transport vesicles may carry exportable molecules the endoplasmic reticulum to another membranous organelle , the Golgi complex.
sentences.cn: 运输小泡能够将可运输分子从内质网运输到高尔基复合体上.

sentences.en: When autophagy occurs, a double membrane forms around a cell organ , or organelle.
sentences.cn: 自噬现象出现时, 会在细胞或细胞器的周围形成双层膜.

sentences.en: With the help of additional specialized proteins, the protein is delivered into the organelle.
sentences.cn: 的帮助下,更多的专门蛋白质, 这种蛋白质是运到细胞器.
